text: 'iina alkufaar aldhyn lm ysddiqu bhjjna wayatna aldalt ealaa whdanytna, walam yaemaluu bshrena tkbrana wastela'an, la tufttah laemalhm fi alhayat wala larwahhm eind almamat 'abwab alsma', wala ymkn 'an yadkhul hwla' alkufaar aljanat 'iilaa 'iidha dakhal aljamal fi thqb al'ibrt, whdha msthyl. wamathal dhlk aljaza' najzi aladhin kathur 'ijramhm, washtdd tghyanhm
